title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: mix cooked pasta with cream cheese

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: diced chicken breast cooked in gravy

title: Fried Rice
summary: Quick, easy, and delicious way to use any leftover vegetables and rice
ingredients: frozen rice, any vegies of choice, soy sauce, eggs
instructions: mix cooked rice with steamed vegetables add soy sauce and fried eggs
